resources.string:
"The first number displayed on the action bar corresponds to the multiple of 10 for which all the units (1, 3, 7 and 9) when added, will all be prime numbers.

For example if 208 is displayed on the action bar, then the numbers 2081, 2083, 2087 and 2089 will all be primes.

The next number displayed after the colon (:) is the currently running line (multiple of 10) that is passing at the top of the display.

On main screen, tapping toggles Action Bar."
